org.unc.lac.baboon.petri

Class BaboonPetriCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unc.lac.baboon.petri.BaboonPetriCore

  • public class BaboonPetriCore
extends java.lang.Object
    BaboonPetriCore is a wrapper containing the objects that are necessary for initialize and execute petri nets.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe
    See Also:
    PetriMonitor, PetriNet

      Creates the Petri Net core of the application by using the pnml file provided as an argument, the petri net type and the transition firing policy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaboonPetriCore

        public BaboonPetriCore(java.lang.String pnmlFilePath,
                       org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.petrinets.factory.PetriNetFactory.petriNetType type,
                       java.lang.Class<A> firingPolicy)
                throws BadPolicyException
        Creates the Petri Net core of the application by using the pnml file provided as an argument, the petri net type and the transition firing policy.

        If the petri net type provided is null then PetriNetFactory.petriNetType.PLACE_TRANSITION is used by default.

        If the transition firing policy provided is null then FirstInLinePolicy is used by default.

        If pnml file path is null then IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Type Parameters:
        A - A Class object that extends TransitionsPolicy-
        Parameters:
        pnmlFilePath - The path to the file containing the PNML (Tina dialect) representation of the petri net.
        type - Indicates if the petri net to be created is a timed petri net or a place-transition petri net.
        firingPolicy - A Class object that extends TransitionsPolicy used by petri monitor to decide which transition to fire next. It might be null, in which case FirstInLinePolicy will be used.
        Throws:
        BadPolicyException - If the transitions policy provided is not correctly formed.

    • Method Detail

      • initializePetriNet

        public void initializePetriNet()
        Initializes the petri net. This method is called by Baboon framework on its setup.

      • changeFiringPolicy

        public void changeFiringPolicy(org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.monitor.policies.TransitionsPolicy firingPolicy)
        Changes the petri monitor transition firing policy. If the policy provided is null then no actions are taken.
        Parameters:
        firingPolicy - A TransitionsPolicy object used by petri monitor to decide which transition to fire next.
        See Also:
        PetriMonitor, PetriMonitor.setTransitionsPolicy(TransitionsPolicy)

      • fireTransition

        public void fireTransition(java.lang.String transitionName,
                           boolean perennialFiring)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.errors.IllegalTransitionFiringError,
                           org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.exceptions.PetriNetException
        Fires a transition by using petri monitor. This method is called automatically by Baboon framework and is not intended to be used by user,
        Parameters:
        transitionName - The name of the transition to be fired.
        perennialFiring - Indicates if the firing is perennial or not.
        Throws:
        org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.exceptions.PetriNetException - If an error regarding petri nets occurs.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.errors.IllegalTransitionFiringError
        See Also:
        PetriMonitor, PetriMonitor.fireTransition(String, boolean)

      • setGuard

        public void setGuard(java.lang.String guardName,
                     boolean newValue)
              throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException,
                     java.lang.NullPointerException,
                     org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.exceptions.PetriNetException
        Sets a guard by using petri monitor. This method is called automatically by Baboon framework and is not intended to be used by user,
        Parameters:
        guardName - The name of the guard to be modified.
        newValue - the new boolean value to be set on the guard.
        Throws:
        org.unc.lac.javapetriconcurrencymonitor.exceptions.PetriNetException - If an error regarding petri nets occurs.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        java.lang.NullPointerException
        See Also:
        PetriMonitor, PetriMonitor.setGuard(String, boolean)

      • listenToTransitionInforms

        public rx.Subscription listenToTransitionInforms(java.lang.String _transitionName,
                                                 rx.Observer<java.lang.String> _observer)
        Subscribe the given observer to the given transition events if it's informed
        Parameters:
        _transitionName - the name of the transition to subscribe to
        _observer - the observer to subscribe
        Returns:
        a Subscription object used to unsubscribe
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given transition is not informed
        See Also:
        PetriMonitor.subscribeToTransition(String, Observer)

      • getMarking

        public java.lang.Integer[] getMarking()
        This method returns the current marking on the Petri Net core of the application
        Returns:
        the tokens in each place of the Petri Net
